description:
It`s the new year and Kanzaki invites Ōtani to a basketball tournament.
What`s more, she`s just broken up with her boyfriend, so their classmates scheme to get her back together with Ōtani.
Lisa does everything to prevent this.
On the day of the tournament, Kanzaki requests that she`d like to meet Ōtani by himself next time.
Seeing that, Lisa leaves the gym, explaining she doesn`t belong there.
As she is crying by herself, Ōtani suddenly appears before Lisa.
She cannot understand why he would have come to see her just then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Situazione disperata! Il ritorno della ex?
Up A Creek Without A Paddle! Back Together With the Ex?!
絶体絶命! 元カノと復活愛?!
